content: leaf lace washcloth designed by jan eaton this pretty washcloth would make the perfect gift when wrapped up with a bar of lovely handmade soap the leaf lace pattern can be worked from row-by-row instructions below or from the chart on the second page materials 1 50g ball of double knitting worsted weight machine-washable cotton or cotton/ acrylic blend with approximately 115m 126 yds to 50g pair of 4mm us size 6 straight needles size approximately 20cm 8in square the washcloth in the photograph was knitted in bergère de france sonora in the onde colourway knitting the washcloth cast on 43 sts and knit 1 row slipping the first st of every row purlwise with yarn at back of work knit 7 row next row sl 1 k5 p to last 6 sts k6 work 16-row pattern given below twice then work row 1-8 once again leaf lace pattern row 1 rs sl 1 k6 *k2 k2 decrease yo k1 yo ssk k3 repeat from * twice more k6 row 2 and every following alternate row sl 1 k5 p to last 6 sts k6 row 3 sl 1 k6 *k1 k2 decrease k1 yo k1 yo k1 ssk k2 repeat from * twice more k6 row 5 sl 1 k6 *k2 decrease k2 yo k1 yo k2 ssk k1 repeat from * twice more k6 row 7 sl 1 k5 k2 decrease *k3 yo k1 yo k3 sl 1 k2 decrease psso repeat from * twice more ending last repeat with ssk instead of sl 1 k2 decrease psso k6 row 9 sl 1 k6 *yo ssk k5 k2 decrease yo k1 repeat from * twice more k6 row 11 sl 1 k6 *yo k1 ssk k3 k2 decrease k1 yo k1 repeat from * twice more k6 row 13 sl 1 k6 *yo k2 ssk k1 k2 decrease k2 yo k1 repeat from * twice more k6 row 15 sl 1 k6 *yo k3 sl 1 k2 decrease psso k3 yo k1 repeat from * twice more k6 row 16 repeat row 2 to finish the washcloth knit 8 row then cast off loosely darn in yarn ends and block if necessary abbreviations k = knit p = purl st sts = stitch stitches sl = slip k2 decrease = knit 2 sts together psso = pass slipped st over yo = yarn forward between needles then back over right-hand needle when working next st ssk = slip next st knitwise slip next st knitwise insert tip of left-hand needle into front of these two sts and knit them together stitch at beginning of row is always slipped purlwise all other stitches are slipped knitwise 1 knitting the washcloth from the chart cast on 43 sts and knit 1 row slipping the first stitch of every row purlwise with yarn at back of work knit 7 row next row sl 1 k5 p to last 6 sts k6 work the lace pattern from the chart reading rs odd-numbered
